tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_attendance (
    employee_id INT,
    date DATE,
    check_in TIME,
    check_out TIME,
    is_on_leave BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    department VARCHAR,
    position VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE attendance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    clock_in TIME,
    clock_out TIME
);

CREATE TABLE leave_records (
    leave_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    leave_date DATE,
    leave_type VARCHAR(50),
    approved BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(255),
    last_name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(255),
    join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    attendance_date DATE,
    arrival_time TIME,
    departure_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE leave_records (
    leave_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    leave_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE payroll (
    payroll_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    salary DECIMAL(10,2),
    pay_date DATE,
    bonus DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE attendance (
    attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    date DATE,
    clock_in TIME,
    clock_out TIME
);

CREATE TABLE leaves (
    leave_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    reason VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE payroll (
    payroll_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    month INT,
    year INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
